title: Empty Option panel when Theme is canceled
author: igor2x
body_snippet: On mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3220: 1. Select some theme (from Options) and click on Cancel button. 2. File | Options and displayed panel is empty.

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: to the same: If Open ssh connection, its should apear in General tab, but its not visible. If then open options its show in Options tab and General become visible. If connection is closed in General tab - tab stays open. If close options tab - then both tabs disapearing.
